participant_1.background:
I have been at the same job for a years.
I do not get along with my dad.
I am a nurse.
I hate cats.

participant_2.background:
I love the band rush.
Last weeks i was at a friends wedding.
I am an omnivore.
I work in sales.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do?
Hi! I like to listen to music, go to concerts, and play video games.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is Rush.
I've never heard of them.
Oh, you should check them out! They're a Canadian rock band that's been around for a long time. They're one of the best rock bands of all time, in my opinion.
I'll have to check them out. What other bands do you like?
I also like Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, and The Beatles.
Those are all great bands!
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse. I've been at the same job for a few years now.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about being a nurse, but I'm not sure I have the stomach for it.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's a rewarding job. I love helping people.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you like your job.
Me too! What do you do for work?
I'm a sales representative. I work in the automotive industry.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in cars, but I don't know much about them.
Well, I can tell you a lot about cars! What would you like to know?
I'm not sure. What's the difference between a sedan and a coupe?
A sedan is a four-door car that's typically designed for families. A coupe is a two-door car that's typically designed for individuals or couples.
Oh, I see. Thanks for explaining that to me.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about cars.
